title: PDP Enhancements
subtitle: Shopify E‑Commerce
desc1: • Redesigned the product gallery into a vertical carousel with image/video support, smooth scrolling, and clickable thumbnails.
desc2: • Added a dynamic star‑rating system with fractional ratings and live review counts pulled from Shopify metafields and APIs.
desc3: • Built collapsible info panels (Tell Me More, Scent Notes, Perfumers) with smooth transitions for cleaner content organization.
desc4: • Integrated subscription purchase options with automatic discount calculations, badges, and instant pricing updates.
desc5: • Created interactive fragrance and size selectors with real‑time variant switching, updating media and pricing instantly.
desc6: • Implemented a 'Favorite' system using localStorage and a modal login prompt, with subtle animations and notifications.
desc7: • Added accessible tooltips for sharing and favoriting actions to improve clarity and usability.
desc8: • Optimized mobile experience with collapsible data panels, adaptive layouts, and touch‑friendly gestures.
desc9: • Boosted performance with lazy loading, dynamic height adjustments, and event‑based rendering.
desc10: • Enhanced accessibility with ARIA labels, focus states, and keyboard navigation support.
desc11: • Leveraged Shopify metafields (subtitle, notes, inspirations, discounts...) to drive dynamic, easily maintained content.

title: Responsive Footer Redesign
subtitle: Shopify Footer Redesign
desc1: Redesigned the store footer for a cleaner, modern look with improved visual hierarchy and brand consistency.
desc2: Implemented a fully responsive multi‑column layout with collapsible menus, adaptive spacing, and accessible navigation patterns for seamless usability across devices.
desc3: Integrated dynamic social media links and contact options, plus a newsletter sign‑up feature powered by a Cloudflare API to capture and process customer data in real time.
desc4: Developed custom Liquid templates and modular CSS components compatible with Shopify’s schema, allowing merchants to configure menus, social links, and branding directly in the theme editor.
desc5: Optimized the footer for performance and scalability with semantic HTML, maintainable CSS architecture, and clear code organization.
desc6: Ensured cross‑browser compatibility and tested responsive behaviors extensively to deliver a polished, production‑ready design.

title: Interactive Shorts Feature
subtitle: Custom Video Carousel
intro: This project introduced a completely new interactive video shorts section. I implemented the layout, carousel, and player controls from scratch, integrating share options and downloadable content according to the provided design.
desc1: Built a custom video carousel component with seamless navigation and responsive layout.
desc2: Integrated dynamic data from Shopify articles and metafields to load video content and metadata in real time.
desc3: Implemented share, and download for each video.
desc4: Optimized for mobile with touch‑friendly controls and adaptive layouts.
